item.title: A perspective on recent COVID-19 status in Japan
item.author: shuuji3@gmail.com (TAKAHASHI Shuuji)
item.description: There are a lot of events, information, and data since the beginning of COVID-19. But I haven’t recorded almost any records on my perspective on COVID-19. I’d like to record at least the current status, especially how I’m checking the latest information and brief summary of the current status in Japan.
